issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] TPC-H Query 19
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11532](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11532). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Fails with error "Cartesian joins are not supported" (probably a bug not detecting certain columns for JOIN).

Error: NotImplemented("Cartesian joins are not supported")

comments.body:
